attributes.description: Original author of this resource, with all relevant details, including organisation.
attributes.name: original_author

attributes.description: Other contributors to the resource, probably listed in  `'name <email>'`  form.
attributes.name: other_contributors

attributes.description: Lifecycle state of the resource, typically including states such as: `initial | submitted | experimental | awaiting_approval | approved | superseded | obsolete`.
attributes.name: lifecycle_state

attributes.description: URI of package to which this resource belongs.
attributes.name: resource_package_uri

attributes.description: Additional non language-sensitive resource meta-data, as a list of name/value pairs.
attributes.name: other_details

attributes.description: Details of all parts of resource description that are natural language-dependent, keyed by language code.
attributes.name: details

meta_info.description: Defines the descriptive meta-data of a resource.
meta_info.name: RESOURCE_DESCRIPTION
